column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the sliced Brisket platter with two sides
column2: Mac and Cheese and Fries. The lady at the counter said those were the two most popular. I also had the bread pudding. The Brisket was divine. It was good with the thinner of the two BBQ sauces. Although
column3: mind not to use too much. The meat needs to carry the flavor. The Mac and cheese was really good with a nice crust on top. The fries were not bad. Perhaps because I had so much food they didn't stand out. The slaw was good
column4: but I could eat much of it because I wanted to save room for the Bread Pudding. It was more bread than pudding
column5: but it was incredible! This is a must try.
